author: @itplacementprep
text: Summary : A One sample t-test tests the mean of a sample group against a known population mean.                      Two sample t test, An Independent Samples t-test compares the means for two groups.                       A Paired sample t-test compares means from the same group at different times (say, one year apart).

author: @arpitjaiswal5972
text: Why T test is used? Because there is no information given for Population SD so Z can't be used. If population SD was given then use Z test t distribution is Normal distribution / chi square. Check the formula you will be able to find the realtion

text: Great Video, Kudos! But, we should never say "we are accepting Null Hypothesis", we SHOULD Say it as "We are Failing to Reject Null Hypothesis", as there is always a possibility of error that lies with our sample data
